title: Ep 99: Sticky Bean Bags ft. EmoJoseph
description:
In This Episode: We brought back EmoJoseph to help judge our juiciest story yet. We have boyfriend made about the bikini his girlfriend wore, a role-player gets kicked from a party because of his race, a neckbeard reaches to the internet to help find the perfect gift, and a listener sends in a wild submission. And for this week's Circle Jerdge we read some Judgies fan fiction to EmoJoseph.
Where you can follow Joe: Instagram | Twitter | TikTok
https://www.instagram.com/josephdubaymusic
https://www.twitter.com/EmoJosephTikTok
https://www.tiktok.com/@emojoseph 
Get Judgies Merch Here: https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!  https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350
Leave a Review!  https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod
Intro Music by: Iván  https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1
Story Links:
Time Stamps: 0:00 Intro  #Judgies #Reddit #Drama
